[RigidBody]

Meta data to track the relation between a NxShape and an CK3dEntity. Also used to track a wheel object in the NxShapes user data. More...

Detailed Description

Meta data to track the relation between a NxShape and an CK3dEntity. Also used to track a wheel object in the NxShapes user data.
